回.definition: to circle; to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to revolve; Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims); time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book)

回信.definition: to reply; to write back; letter written in reply; CL:封[feng1]

回光反照.definition: final radiance of setting sun; fig. dying flash (of lucidity or activity, prior to demise)

回光返照.definition: final radiance of setting sun; fig. dying flash (of lucidity or activity, prior to demise)

回力球.definition: (sports) jai alai; cesta punta; ball used in this sport

回升.definition: to rise again after a fall; to pick up; rally (stock market etc)

回南天.definition: weather phenomenon characterized by condensation of warm moist air on cool surfaces during the transition from winter to spring in Southern China

回合.definition: one of a sequence of contests (or subdivisions of a contest) between the same two opponents; round (boxing etc); rally (tennis etc); frame (billiards etc); inning; (tennis, soccer etc) rubber or leg; round (of negotiations)

回吐.definition: to regurgitate; (fig.) (of a stock market) to give up (gains)

回味.definition: to call to mind and ponder over; aftertaste

回味無窮.definition: to have a rich aftertaste; (fig.) memorable; to linger in one's memory

回單兒.definition: erhua variant of 回單|回单[hui2 dan1]

回嗔作喜.definition: to go from anger to happiness (idiom)

回回青.definition: Mohammedan blue (a cobalt blue pigment imported from Persia, used as an underglaze on Chinese porcelain during the Ming dynasty)

回國.definition: to return to one's home country

回執.definition: receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)

回報.definition: (in) return; reciprocation; payback; retaliation; to report back; to reciprocate

回堵.definition: (Tw) (of traffic) to be jammed; traffic backup

回天乏術.definition: (idiom) nothing can be done to remedy the situation; beyond recovery

回天無力.definition: unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom); to fail to save the situation

回奉.definition: to return a compliment; to give a return present

回娘家.definition: (of a wife) to return to her parental home; (fig.) to return to one's old place, job, school etc

回家吃自己.definition: (coll.) (Tw) to get sacked; to be fired

回帖.definition: to reply to an invitation; (Internet) to post a comment on a forum topic

回彈.definition: (of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape; (fig.) to rebound; to bounce back

回復.definition: to recover; to revert; to return to (good health, normal condition etc); variant of 回覆|回复[hui2fu4]

回想.definition: to recall; to recollect; to think back

回懟.definition: (Internet slang) to retaliate verbally; to hit back (at critics)

回扣.definition: brokerage; a commission paid to a middleman; euphemism for a bribe; a kickback

回抽.definition: to pull back; to withdraw; (finance) (of a stock price etc) to retrace

回採.definition: stoping (excavating ore using stepped terraces); to extract ore; extraction; to pull back

回描.definition: flyback (of electron beam in cathode ray tube); retrace

回擊.definition: to fight back; to return fire; to counterattack

回收.definition: to recycle; to reclaim; to retrieve; to recover; to recall (a defective product)

回收站.definition: recycling center; waste materials collection depot; (computing) recycle bin

回敬.definition: to return a compliment; to give sth in return

回數.definition: number of times (sth happens); number of chapters in a classical novel; (math.) palindromic number

回族.definition: Hui Islamic ethnic group living across China

回族人.definition: Hui person; member of Hui ethnic group living across China

回暖.definition: (of the weather) to warm up again

回望.definition: to return sb's gaze; to meet sb's eyes; to look back (to one's rear); (fig.) to look back at (the past); to reflect on

回歸.definition: to return to; to retreat; regression (statistics)

回歸年.definition: the solar year; the year defined as the period between successive equinoxes

回歸線.definition: tropic; one of the two latitude lines, Tropic of Capricorn or Tropic of Cancer

回民區.definition: Huimin District of Hohhot city 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia

回流.definition: to flow back; reflux; circumfluence; refluence; backward flow; returning flow (e.g. of talent)

回溯.definition: to recall; to look back upon

回滾.definition: (computing) to roll back; rollback; (sports) (of a ball) to come back (due to backspin or sloping ground)

回潮.definition: to become moist again; to revive (usually of sth bad); resurgence

回火.definition: to temper (iron); to flare back; flareback (in a gas burner); (of an engine) to backfire

回爐.definition: to melt down; to remelt (metals); fig. to acquire new education; to bake again

回眸.definition: to glance back; to look back; retrospective

回神.definition: to collect one's thoughts (after being surprised or shocked); to snap out of it (after being lost in thought)

回祿.definition: traditional Fire God; destruction by fire

回祿之災.definition: to have one's house burned down; fire disaster

回禮.definition: to return a greeting; to send a gift in return

回稟.definition: to report back to one's superior

回空.definition: to return empty (i.e. to drive back with no passengers or freight)

回答.definition: to reply; to answer; reply; answer

回籠.definition: to steam again; to rewarm food in a bamboo steamer; to withdraw currency from circulation

回紇.definition: Huihe, ancient name of an ethnic group who were the ancestors of the Uyghurs 維吾爾族|维吾尔族[Wei2wu2er3zu2] and the Yugurs 裕固族[Yu4gu4zu2]

回絕.definition: to rebuff; to refuse; to turn down

回老家.definition: to go back to one's roots; to return to one's native place; by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)

回耗.definition: to write back; to send a reply

回腸.definition: ileum (segment of small intestine between the jejunum 空腸|空肠[kong1 chang2] and appendix 盲腸|盲肠[mang2 chang2])

回腸盪氣.definition: soul-stirring (of drama, poem or artwork); heart-rending; deeply moving

回良玉.definition: Hui Liangyu (1944-) PRC Hui national career politician from Guilin, background in economics, politburo member 2002-2012, deputy chair of State Council 2003-2013

回落.definition: to fall back; to return to low level after a rise (in water level, price etc)

回血.definition: (medicine) (of blood) to flow back into the IV tube; (gaming) to restore health points; (fig.) to recover (to some extent)

回覆.definition: to reply (by letter, email etc); reply; answer

回護.definition: to stick up for a wrongdoer

回贈.definition: to give sb (a gift) in return

回跌.definition: to fall back (of water level or share prices)

回車.definition: to turn a vehicle around; (computing) "carriage return" character; the "Enter" key; to hit the "Enter" key

回車鍵.definition: (computing) enter key; return key (on a keyboard)

回返.definition: to return; to go back; to come back

回退.definition: to revert (computing); to return (a package or letter) to the sender

回過頭來.definition: to turn one's head; to turn around; (fig.) to return (to a previous point); to come back (to what one was saying before); (fig.) to look back (in time); to reflect on the past

回避.definition: variant of 迴避|回避[hui2 bi4]

回鍋.definition: to cook again; to rewarm food

回門.definition: first return of bride to her parental home

回電.definition: to call sb back (on the phone); a return call; to reply to a telegram; to wire back; a reply telegram

回響.definition: variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]

回頭.definition: to turn round; to turn one's head; later; by and by

回頭路.definition: the road back to where one came from

回饋.definition: to repay a favor; to give back; feedback

回首.definition: to turn around; to look back; (fig.) to recall the past

回馬槍.definition: sudden thrust (that catches the opponent off guard)

回鶻.definition: Huihu, ancient name of an ethnic group who were the ancestors of the Uyghurs 維吾爾族|维吾尔族[Wei2wu2er3zu2] and the Yugurs 裕固族[Yu4gu4zu2]
